column2: BRIEF-Redwood Trust Announces Dividend Increase Of 7 Pct For Q2 2018 May 22 (Reuters) - Redwood Trust Inc: * REDWOOD TRUST ANNOUNCES DIVIDEND INCREASE OF 7% FOR THE SECOND QUARTER OF 2018 * INCREASES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND BY 7 PERCENT TO $0.30PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Redwood Trust Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.50 May 7 (Reuters) - Redwood Trust Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.35 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * AT MARCH 31, 2018, REDWOOD REPORTED GAAP BOOK VALUE PER SHARE OF $16.12, AS COMPARED WITH $15.83 AT DECEMBER 31, 2017 * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME $35 MILLION VERSUS $34 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
